title: Nakrason (or Nakrasos)
description: An ancient settlement whose precise location is unknown. Modern scholars place it variously at Bakir, Maltepe, or İlyaslar in modern Turkey.

properties.description: Prehistoric settlement Höyük, associated by Ramsay with Nakrason.
properties.title: Maltepe: Imagery Location

properties.description: Possible location of Nakrason/Nakrasos. Location based on OpenStreetMap.
